title: What is ALTAI?
content: ALTAI is a self-assessment tool developed by the High-Level Expert Group to ensure AI systems are trustworthy, based on seven key requirements.

title: Purpose of ALTAI
content: ALTAI provides a practical framework for organizations to assess AI systems’ alignment with ethical principles and fundamental rights.

title: Key Objectives
content: ALTAI aims to provide a self-assessment tool to ensure AI systems are trustworthy, focusing on seven key requirements: human agency, robustness, privacy, transparency, fairness, well-being, and accountability.

title: Accuracy
content: ALTAI requires assessing AI accuracy through task-specific metrics, ensuring reliable predictions for unseen data. Did you evaluate accuracy metrics for your AI system?

title: Reliability and Reproducibility
content: ALTAI emphasizes ensuring AI systems produce consistent and reproducible results across different conditions.

title: Cybersecurity Measures
content: ALTAI requires implementing encryption, intrusion detection, and regular security audits to protect AI systems.
